medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with severe RUQ pain since last night, with a history of intermittent mild pain over the past 9 days. The pain worsened overnight without any precipitating factors. The pain is described as sharp, non-radiating.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes mellitus type 2 (DM2), hypertension (HTN), gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), depression, previous surgeries including tonsillectomy, jaw surgery, eye surgery, and bilateral open inguinal hernia repairs.
